New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 10 月 2 日，星期三 06:18:37 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Auroras in Auckland incoming? Unusually intense solar flare blasted from the Sun https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auroras-in-auckland-incoming-unusually-intense-solar-flare-blasted-from-the-sun/63M546NVPREN3BRN6GTFUJ7CCA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auroras-in-auckland-incoming-unusually-intense-solar-flare-blasted-from-the-sun/63M546NVPREN3BRN6GTFUJ7CCA/ Jamie MortonAstro-photographers could soon be in for another treat: Nasa records a major solar flare. Wed, 02 Oct 2024 05:49:18 +0000 Nasa’s Solar Dynamics Observatory captured this image of a solar flare – seen as the bright flash in the lower left – on October 1. The image shows a subset of extreme ultraviolet light that highlights the extremely hot material in flares and which is colorised in red and orange. Photo / Nasa, SDO

Pranksters rename New Zealand schools on Google maps https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pranksters-rename-new-zealand-schools-on-google-maps/B7JNSJMLNJFO7INVDFGFP62DDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pranksters-rename-new-zealand-schools-on-google-maps/B7JNSJMLNJFO7INVDFGFP62DDU/ Schools across NZ have had their names changed on Google Maps. Ricky Harder pleads guilty to torturing man inside Helensville, Auckland home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/ricky-harder-pleads-guilty-to-torturing-man-inside-helensville-auckland-home/HMQ4JWONIBDGZMQDOK5D5KPL6I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/ricky-harder-pleads-guilty-to-torturing-man-inside-helensville-auckland-home/HMQ4JWONIBDGZMQDOK5D5KPL6I/ Craig KapitanThe victim was taken to a gang-affiliated home before he was stripped naked and attacked. Lone Motutapu Island rat declared dead after $50k hunt https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lone-motutapu-island-rat-declared-dead-after-50k-hunt/ZCNMHCXDCRHXTHSAPP6TBMPQEA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lone-motutapu-island-rat-declared-dead-after-50k-hunt/ZCNMHCXDCRHXTHSAPP6TBMPQEA/ It's been loose on the otherwise pest-free island for months, but it's come at a price. Wed, 02 Oct 2024 03:57:23 +0000 A lone rat caught on camera on the otherwise pest-free paradise of Motutapu Island has been killed. Photo / 123RF
